text: Katsumi Yamada (6 June 1905 - 1970) was a Japanese ski jumper. He competed in the individual event at the 1932 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1905 births Category:1970 deaths Category:Japanese male ski jumpers Category:Japanese male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Japan Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Japan Category:Ski jumpers at the 1932 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1932 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Sapporo
title: Katsumi Yamada
